name: Super Exploding Ball
description:
A game made for a gamejam, where your movement is your attack >:D

~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~

Sure you can play with a keyboard or a controller, but you should play with a controller. Definitely.

'A' button / Space Bar : Explode (keep pushing the button for a powerful explosion)
Right Stick / Arrows key : Aiming your explosion
LB / Left ctrl : Show the whole level
Escape : Quit the game
